title: Legendary Concerts in NYC This Month: Eric Clapton & Harry Potter
seo_title: Legendary Concerts in NYC This Month: Eric Clapton & Harry Potter
short_description: One of the best parts of visiting New York is the access to incredible concerts. Here is our top two family-friendly picks for this month:
long_description:
One of the best parts of visiting New York is the access to incredible concerts. Here is our top two family-friendly picks for this month:


ERIC CLAPTON, MARCH 19 & 20TH


Join Clapton as he celebrates 50 years of music. This is two of the four exclusive performances he is giving in New York this year--the next two are in September. Part of Clapton's small but coveted North American tour that only includes New York's Madison Square Garden and Los Angeles' Forum. Watch as the legend bring his old hits to life.


Madison Square Garden, 4 Pennsylvania, New York, NY 10001


HARRY POTTER AND THE SORCERER'S STONE IN CONCERT, MARCH 31ST & APRIL 1ST


For two nights, the New Jersey Symphony Orchestra will perform John Williams' incredible score from this famous cult film. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for fans to relive the magic of the film by watching it on a high-definition 40-foot screen while hearing a live orchestra. Perfect fun for the whole family and fans of every type.


Radio City Music Hall, 1260 6th Avenue, New York, NY 10020
